name: Responsive Card Component
description:
The BlurCapImage is a fully responsive card component that you can use to build appealing feeds


The best use case is when articles have a nice image or illustration that you want to take advantage of not only on their details page, but in the feed as well.


The component is fluid, built up with Auto Layout, and Variants provide an option to use it in a horizontal or vertical direction. Hover interaction is already included in the variant.


Tweak it, use it!


For a live example, check out https://theuniverse.io
